moves.1. e4: Decided to annotate this because at the end I felt I analyzed the checkmate very nicely and unexpectedly!
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. Bb5: My opponent plays the roy lopez variation.
moves.3... Nge7: I defend and develop with my other knight
moves.4. d4 f6 5. Bg5: Questionable move at the time, but it was part of his plan
moves.5... fxg5 6. Nxg5 a6 7. Qf3: That was why he sac'd the bishop, howevr he earns a knight back out of it.
moves.8. Qxf5 Qf6: Offered a trade to relieve some pressure.
This is where I analyzed the mate.
moves.12... Bd7: Offering a free pawn and to attack my rook.
